title: Khalifa Haftar
summary: Field Marshal Khalifa Belqasim Haftar (Arabic: خليفة بلقاسم حفتر‎, romanized: Ḵalīfa Bilqāsim Ḥaftar; born 7 November 1943) is a Libyan-American[3] politician, military officer and the commander of the Tobruk-based Libyan National Army (LNA).[4] On 2 March 2015, he was appointed commander of the armed forces loyal to the elected legislative body, the Libyan House of Representatives.[5]
